name: The Daily Adventures of Slime
description:
You are a glorious slime and you, under the guidance of your bigger slime, must eat hearts!

Hi y'all. This is a student project I worked on using free assets but concept and level design was done by me (also the programming). I'll be crediting the free assets below. Thanks to them for saving me work!

As sort of a developers note, I wanted to add a bit more depth in terms of plot and a few more levels. So if I have time in the future to revisit this I will.
